events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the item does not match the description and I want to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been classified under the refund cluster because the customer is requesting money back for the incorrect item received.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle this refund case for the customer.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I understand you want to request a refund for your order. I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is #12345. I have attached photos showing the wrong color and size delivered instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and provide a prepaid shipping label to return the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the help and will send back the item as soon as I get the label.
The refund has been initiated and the return label emailed. Please follow the instructions, and once we receive the item, your money will be refunded promptly.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the refund and that everything was resolved satisfactorily with your order issue.
Since the refund has been completed and no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Feel free to contact us anytime.
We have sent you a short survey to learn about your satisfaction with our support process. Your feedback is very important to us.
